name: intuitiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being easy and natural to learn, use, or understand: Despite the intuitiveness of the interface, some major shortcomings were identified. The ease-of-use and intuitiveness facilitate user adoption.
the ability to know or understand something because of feelings rather than facts or proof: He was a natural soldier with a rare intuitiveness as to what the enemy was likely to do next. She used her charm and intuitiveness to soothe their anxious guests. See also
intuitive
More examplesFewer examplesI appreciate the intuitiveness of this platform.He plays with a mesmerising intuitiveness, making it look effortless.You may try to balance your lack of intuitiveness with logic and common sense.
